> Could have the linter check for a specific comment /* Continued */ or such

Yes, good idea. Longer term, it could be good to have a `LogPrintf()` and a `LogPrintfContinuation()`, and remove all `
`s from the log strings. `LogPrintf()` would then prefix the log string with a newline followed by the timestamp. `LogPrintfContinuation()` would just print the log string.
